new state - of - the - art results.from sentence: As shown in , our face detector sets some new state - of - the - art results based on the AP score across the three subsets on both validation and testing subsets , i.e. , 97.0 % ( Easy ) , 96.1 % ( Medium ) and 91.8 % ( Hard ) for validation subset , and 96.5 % ( Easy ) , 95.7 % ( Medium ) and 91.2 % ( Hard ) for testing subset .

outperform.has: all the compared state - of - the - art methods

results.from sentence: These results outperform all the compared state - of - the - art methods and demonstrate the superiority of our AInnoFace detector .
